statements: SELECT * FROM reasons_for_return;
SELECT reason FROM reasons_for_return WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, reason FROM reasons_for_return ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_return WHERE reason LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_return WHERE id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_return WHERE reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT reason, id FROM reasons_for_return WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY reason ASC;
SELECT id, reason FROM reasons_for_return WHERE reason IS NOT NULL AND id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT reason FROM reasons_for_return WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY reason DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reasons_for_return WHERE reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_return;
SELECT reason_description FROM reasons_for_return;
SELECT return_id, reason_description FROM reasons_for_return WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM improve_areas;
SELECT area_description FROM improve_areas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_return WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT reason_description FROM reasons_for_return WHERE return_id = 2;
SELECT reason_description FROM reasons_for_return WHERE return_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM improve_areas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM improve_areas WHERE area_description LIKE '%improve%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM return_categories;
SELECT reason, timestamp FROM reasons_for_return WHERE return_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT category_name FROM return_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM return_feedback WHERE rating >= 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT reason, timestamp FROM reasons_for_return WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_return ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT reason, COUNT(*) FROM reasons_for_return GROUP BY reason
SELECT r.reason, f.feedback, f.rating FROM reasons_for_return r JOIN return_feedback f ON r.return_id = f.return_id
SELECT f.rating, COUNT(*) FROM return_feedback f GROUP BY f.rating ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT r.reason, f.feedback, f.rating FROM reasons_for_return r LEFT JOIN return_feedback f ON r.return_id = f.return_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT reason, description FROM reasons_for_return ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM reasons_for_return ORDER BY reason DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, reason, description FROM reasons_for_return WHERE reason ILIKE 'defective%' OR reason ILIKE 'damaged%';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC, total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT reason FROM reasons_for_return WHERE reason_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM orders o JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.customer_id = 2;
